noseiumz.name: Noseium Z
noseiumz.desc: If held by a Nosepass with Fissure, it can use Shitpost.

magmarizer.desc: If held by a Steelix, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.

astleyiumz.name: Astleyium Z
astleyiumz.desc: If held by a Golem with Rock Slide, it can use Rickrollout.

dusknoiriumz.name: Dusknoirium Z
dusknoiriumz.desc: If held by a Dusknoir with Mean Look, it can use Petrifying Gaze.

thunderstone.desc: If held by a Rotom, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.
thunderstone.shortDesc: If held by a Rotom, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.

victiniumz.name: Victinium Z
victiniumz.desc: If held by a Victini with V-create, it can use Blaze of Glory.

marowakiumz.name: Marowakium Z
marowakiumz.desc: If held by a Marowak with Earthquake, it can use Great Eqake.

thicciniumz.name: Thiccinium Z

thicciniumz.desc: If held by a Mamoswine with Thicc, it can use Extra T h i c c.

buzzniumz.name: Buzznium Z

darkrainiumz.name: Darkrainium Z

charcoal.desc: Fire-type attacks have 1.2x power. Reshiram with Blue Flare can use Bleh Flame.
